title: Midnight Soiree - Yasuo animated short

embed.description: Another league of legends animation featuring Yasuo. Enjoy! email: thetanimated@gmail.com Twitter: @thetanimated I've been using these cartoons as a tool to teach myself animation. All animation produced in this cartoon was made using Adobe After Effects and Photoshop.

body:
Here's another Yasuo-related animated short that I made. Enjoy!

{{champion:157}}

replies.body: I love what appears to be his ult, around 1:40
Yeah, that's supposed to be his ult. Glad you liked it!

Really cool!  The only things that took me out of it were 

A) he's got big ears :D  and 
B) don't super awesome swordsmen run with their sword outstretched behind them?

Really well done though - I can tell you put a lot of effort into it, and the sound really helps too.

Thanks, I was having too much fun making this I didn't want it to end. I'm thinking of putting out an extended version to fix the little errors that I see now and possibly add a "boss" fight in the end.
nice one! love it
Glad you enjoyed it!
This is really cool! The fight scenes remind me of those from One Finger Death Punch. It's intense, fast paced, and really smooth. I'd love to see more like this. :)
Thank you! I'm aiming for more AND better stuff than this!
wow that was bad... couldn't finish
Could you do better?
actually.. i could lol
Challenge accepted.
Try putting it up on reddit, it may get more attention that way
I did, but it just gets buried in r/leagueoflegends. Any advice?
Eh it's normal for that to happen, I guess you just have to step up your game.

Pretty good, not like I could do better but it felt slightly clunky compared to some other stuff I've seen. Maybe try adding more motion to the swords so it doesn't look like they blink around, even if it's just like a frame's worth of extra swing.
Hey thanks! I'm still learning to animate, so I'm aiming to get better with each video.
nice job
Thanks!
This is pretty cool.
